Verify its aria-label is 'Contact form dialog'
Hover over the first product row in the inventory table
Verify its background color changes to #F0F0F0 within 200ms with a transition on hover
Verify the product name 'Laptop Pro' is displayed in bold (font weight 700) with font size 15px and color #333333
Verify the row has height 40px and its cells are left-aligned
Verify the 'Stock' column displays a count of 50 items
Verify the row's padding-left is 16px
Verify the row remains visible and is not selected
Verify its aria-label for this row is 'Product Laptop Pro inventory details'
Hover over the 'Help' icon
Verify a tooltip becomes visible after 300ms, positioned 10px below the icon, with text 'Click for assistance'
Verify the tooltip has background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, border radius 4px, width 150px, height 30px, and opacity 0.9
Verify its aria-label for the icon is 'Help information'
Click the 'Next Page' pagination button
Verify page '2' becomes active with background color #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, font size 14px, and font weight 700
Verify the 'Previous Page' button becomes enabled
Verify the pagination container has a total count of 5 page numbers, each 30px wide, 30px high, with 5px margin-right
Verify the pagination container is right-aligned
Verify the aria-label for page '2' is 'Current page 2'
Load the user profile page
Verify the profile picture element has source 'user_avatar.jpg' and is loaded
Verify its shape is circular, with width 80px and height 80px
Verify it has 2px solid border #007BFF and opacity 1
Verify its alt text is 'User profile picture'
Verify its margin-top is 20px
Verify its x-coordinate is 20px and y-coordinate is 20px from the top-left
Click the 'Reviews' tab
Verify it becomes active with bottom border 3px solid #007BFF, text color #007BFF, and font weight 600
Verify the 'Description' tab becomes inactive, changing its text color to #666666 and removing its border
Verify the 'Reviews' tab has padding 10px, font size 16px, and is visible
Verify its aria-label is 'Product reviews tab'
Verify the tab's top edge aligns with other tabs at 100px
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar element appears, initially with width 0% and background color #CCCCCC
Verify after 5 seconds, its width is 75%, background color #28A745, and it contains text '75% Complete' with font size 12px and color #FFFFFF
Verify its height is 20px and border radius 10px
Verify its aria-label is 'File upload progress'
Verify its margin-bottom is 15px
Trigger a 'Success' notification
Verify the toast message appears at the top right, stays visible for 5 seconds, and fades out with an opacity transition over 800ms
Verify it has background color #28A745, text color #FFFFFF, font size 15px, and displays 'Item added to cart successfully'
Verify its width is 300px, height 60px, and border radius 5px
Verify its aria-label is 'Success notification'
Load the 'Contact Us' page showing a map
Verify the map is rendered, centered at coordinates (34.0522, -118.2437), has width 600px, height 400px, and border 1px solid #DDDDDD
Verify a pin icon (source 'pin_icon.png') is visible at the specified coordinates
Verify the map controls (zoom in/out) are enabled and visible
Verify its aria-label is 'Company location map'
Open the date picker input field
Verify the calendar grid becomes visible
Verify the current date '2023-10-27' is highlighted with background color #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, and font weight 700
Verify the date picker's width is 280px, height 250px, and its border is 1px solid #CCCCCC
Verify the 'Next Month' button is enabled
Verify the input's aria-label is 'Select a date'
Verify the value of the input field is empty
Verify the 'Price Range' slider handle can be dragged
Verify its value changes from '0' to '100' as dragged
Verify the fill bar has background color #007BFF and width adjusts dynamically
Verify the slider is visible, enabled, has height 8px for the track, and border radius 4px
Verify its aria-label is 'Select price range'
Verify the slider's top position is 300px on the page
Verify the current selected value is displayed with font size 14px, color #333333, and font weight 500

Verify it has 3px border, border-radius 50% (circular shape), opacity 1, is centered horizontally, and margin-top 50px
Verify its aria-label is 'Loading content'
Verify it does not disappear before 2 seconds

Verify its aria-label is 'Remember me for future logins'
